mapper.select: SELECT r.recommendation_month, r.theme, r.target_audience, r.title, r.subject_category, r.author, r.publisher, r.publication_year, r.isbn, r.call_number FROM recommended_books r, kcisa_recommended_books k WHERE 1=1 AND k.normalized_title = r.normalized_title AND k.id = #{bookId} LIMIT 1;
